text:
If Tomcat is installed in a path with spaces in Windows XP some bugs may appear.
For instance, if Axis is deployed once Tomcat installation has finished and some
jars added to it, those jars would appear as found in the Axis happiness page.
Nevertheless, when trying to run some webapps that use them they will throw a
ClassNotFoundException.

After long debugging I have found that the error doesn't appear if you reinstall
everything in a path without spaces. Therefore, the NullSoft installer for
Windows should encourage the user to install Tomcat in a path without spaces.

you still see this issue with 5.5.20 please re-open this issue and supply the
simplest possible test war that replicates the issue and I will investigate further.
